text: @realDonaldTrump @RoyCooperNC @DanForestNC @NC_Governor was looking after the safety and well-being of North Carolinians when he said masks would be required and some #GOP convention activities might not be possible due trying to limit the spread of #COVID19 . @realDonaldTrump showed he didn’t care about North Carolinians
